Lang.cmdHelpLogs: >`logs` `thread_id/@user...` - Upload logs for given users or thread
Lang.cmdHelpResume: >`resume` `thread_id/@user...` - Resume conversation under a new thread
Lang.fileTooLarge:
>_*%s not forwarded.*_
>File exceeds maximum size limit of %d bytes.
Lang.inConvChannel: >_*Users in `#%s` can not start conversations. Send `!help` for a list of available commands.*_
Lang.sessionExpiredConv:
>_*Session [%s] has expired.*_
>Edits/reactions to previous messages will no longer be reflected in communications.
Lang.sessionExpiredDirect:
>_*Session has expired.*_
>If your issue has not yet been resolved, an RA will be contacting you ASAP.
>Edits/reactions to previous messages will no longer be reflected in communications.
Lang.sessionNotice:
_*Conversation started with: %s*_
_(converse in thread under this message)_
Lang.sessionStartDirect: >_*A dialogue has been started with the RA team. An RA will reach out to you shortly.*_
